---
title: "Slaton City"
---

## Setup

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)
```

## Import 

Same process as before

```{r}
slaton <- read_excel("data-raw/SlatonCity.xls")

slaton |> glimpse()
```

## Clean

Just need to change dates to dttm types. 

```{r}
slaton_clean <- slaton |> mutate(
  date_arrest = mdy(date_arrest),
  DOB = mdy(DOB))

slaton_clean
```

## Export 

```{r}
slaton_clean |> write_rds("data-processed/Slaton-City.rds")
```
